Package se.arkalix.net.http

Interface HttpConnectionWithArSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpConnection
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpConsumerConnection, HttpServiceConnection
    public interface HttpConnectionWithArSystem
extends HttpConnection
    An HttpConnection established between a local and a remote Arrowhead system.
